input.job_description:
WAQAS ZULFIQAR  
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Customer -oriented, strategic -thinking sales and management professional with 10 years of experience in building 
relationships, cultivating partnerships, retaining top accounts and growing profit channels by establishing trust. 
Persuasive, self -motivated leadership professional with expertise on expanding network connections, persuasively 
intro ducing products, educating clients, implementing pricing strategies, territory development, inventory control 
and projections and determining customer needs to deliver solutions. Tactical team builder and strategic planner 
seeking to leverage background to  fulfill robust leadership role with progressive organization . 
SKILLS  
 
 
• Team Leadership  
• Positive Thinking  
• Time Management  
• Negotiation Skills               
• Problem Solving  
• New business dev elopment  
• Social Selling                                  
• Active Listening                      
• Technology  
• Fast Lerner         
• Vendor management  
• Staff management  
• Business development and planning  
• Forecasting ability  
• Verbal and written communication  
• Client relations  
• Goal -setting  
• Inventory management  
• Project Management   
• Multi -Tasking  
Education  
 
Bachelor of  Commerce  (BCOM -IT) 2008  
Allama  Iqbal  Open  University  (AIOU)  Islamabad, Pakistan  
Computer Science - Associate  of Science  2004  
Punjab  College  Sargodha  - Boys  Campus  Sargodha, Punjab  
Work History  
 
Business  Development  Manager  April, 2020 to  Present  
MRGT Training &  IT Solution  Islamabad , Pakistan  
• Contacting potential clients to establish rapport and arrange 
meetings.  
• Planning  and overseeing new marketing initiatives.  
• Researching organizations and individuals to find new opportunities.  
• Increasing the value of current customers while attracting new  ones.  
• Finding and developing new markets and improving sales.  
• Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events.  Sargodha, Pakistan | (0333) 6788771 | waqaszulfiqar84@gmail.com  • Developing quotes and proposals for clients.  
• Developing goals for the development team and business growth and ensuring they are 
met.  
• Training personnel and helping team members develop their skills.  
• Forecasted factors such as sales numbers and product profitability to determine ideal strategies.  
 
 
  Sales  and Operations Executive  April, 2019 to April,  2020  
Dulsco  Head  Office                                                                                                                     Dubai, UAE  
 
• Contacting potential clients to establish rapport and arrange meetings.  
• Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives.  
• Researching organizations and individuals to find new opportunities.  
• Increasing the value of current customers while attracting new  ones.  
• Finding and developing new markets and improving sales.  
• Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events.  
• Developing quotes and proposals for clients.  
• To schedule client interviews for shortlisted resources and obtain post interview feedback.  
• To meet and counsel daily absenteeism employees along with the welfare and forward the report to 
HRC for the disciplinary action.  
• To supervise project deployment and ensure smooth running of projects with zero client complaints.  
• To ensure resources report on duty for projects and maintain grooming standards.   
• Brief employees prior to deployment -to reduce the work refusal etc. for any new  
clients.  
• Follow up with CRT team with regards to new joiner emergency leave status.  
• Prepare and collect the resume for t he list of the skill claimed employees and schedule them for the test 
with concern dept.  
• Maintain records of new site inspection reports along with risk assessment report.  
Prepare list of the clients with past data for best employee nomination award.  
 
Operations  Manager  September, 2014 to April,  2019  
Sites power  Institute                                                                                                            Dubai , UAE  
 
• Managing daily operational activities & logistics requirements.  
• Designing Standard Operations Procedures (SOP’s) for complex tasks & evaluate them by their 
performance. Establish objectives and strategies in regard to operational structure, competition a nd 
pricing of projects.  
• Design and negotiate financial solutions, and demonstrate relevant effective management techniques. 
Analyze and identify needs for logistics and trade services, shipping and other transport modes.  
• Develop logistical plans, polici es, and procedures necessary to provide support in the Operational areas of 
supply, Logistics, transportation, maintenance, and services.  
• Taking decisions in difficult situations, in response to bad weather conditions, security alerts or industrial 
relati ons problems.  
• Meets cost standards by monitoring expenses; implementing cost -saving  actions.  
• Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications. 
Enhances department and organization reputation by accep ting ownership for accomplishing new and 
different requests; exploring opportunities to add value to job  accomplishments.   
Sales & Operations Executive  June, 2009 to June,  2014  
NADRA  Regional  Head  Office  Islamabad                                Islamabad, Pakistan  
 
 
• Take instructions provided by manager and complete required tasks.            
• Screen and handle telephone calls and manage enquirers.  
• Manage post, emails and faxes, issuing responses where possible.                       
• Act as a main point of contact.  
• Assist managers with meetings and arrange logistics, such as travel and accommodation.                             
• Undertake research and  produce documents for meetings.  
• Produce letters and, if necessary, reports on behalf of your manager.                    
• Oversee office procedures.  
• Oversee some aspects of finances, manage an office team and supervise project work.                                      
• Manage personal diaries and undertake other non -work -related  errands.  
• To prepare MIS Reports fo r improve quality in service performance  
 
 
Certification s 
 
• Leading at a Distan ce   
• Critical Thinking  
• Strategic Thinking  
• Problem Solving                                                                                                                                                                                                    
• UAE Driving License (License Number 4000348)  
• Pitching Yourself                        
• Microsoft Office (word, Excel, PowerPoint)  
• Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP)  
• Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA)  
• Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH ) 
• Introduction to Cyber Security  
• Linux Administration
input.additional_info: [Fictional Company] values candidates from top-tier universities such as [University A] and [University B]. We support diversity and inclusion in our hiring processes. Relocation assistance is provided on a case-by-case basis. We assess skills through a combination of technical interviews, case studies, and practical tests to ensure the candidate’s fitment with the organizational culture and job requirements.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
Strong understanding of sales processes and negotiation skills
Proficiency in business analytics and digital strategy
5+ years of business development experience in a leadership role
